A region will be created with the following coded name:\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\b CHAP=Title:\b0\i given_title\b\i0 |Performer:\b0\i given_performer\b\i0 |Year:\b0\i year_of_production\b\i0 |Label:\b0\i given_label\b\i0 |Duration:\b0\i duration_in_seconds\i0\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\qj In case the last 2 fields are not inserted, the string is reduced to the following format:\par \b CHAP=Title:\b0\i given_title\b\i0 |Performer:\b0\i given_performer\b\i0 |Duration:\b0\i duration_in_seconds\i0\par At the same time, a SideCar file is created into the directory of the project, where the file \b .RPP\b0 is placed.\f1\fs22\par }
